author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police on Monday arrested two persons for allegedly murdering S. Vigneshkumar (23), a BJP functionary at Kavundampalayam during Pongal celebrations.

The arrested were: R. Saravanan alias Kuruvi (24), and Sarath alias Sarath Kumar (25) of Kavundampalayam, police sources said.
title: Two held for murder
